description.en:
# Class Viewer

A script which is used to view Objective-C class of JSBox, such as `BaseHintView` and so on. It helps to find its Instance Methods, Class Methods, Properties and more.

## Notes
- Correct class name is required.
- Case sensitive.

## Author
description.zh:
# Class Viewer

用于查看 JSBox 内 Objective-C 类，如 `BaseHintView` 等。此脚本可帮助寻找该类的实例方法、类方法、属性等。

## 说明
- 需要输入准确的类名；
- 输入区分大小写。

## 作者

description.en:
# Font Family

A script which is used to view build-in font families of iOS. Tap a cell to change the text you want and swipe left to copy the font family name.

## Notes
- Build-in font families only.

## Author
description.zh:
# Font Family

用于查看 iOS 内置的字体集。点击任意一行输入想要显示的内容，左滑复制字体名称。

## 说明
- 仅内置字体集可查。

## 作者

description.en:
# Quick Delete

A script which is used to delete multiple scripts quickly.

## Notes
- Delete action will not be undone, use at your own risk.

## Author
description.zh:
# Quick Delete

用于快速删除多个脚本。

## 说明
- 删除操作无法撤回，请自行承担风险。

## 作者

description.en:
# iCon Picker

A script which is used to pick the icon of JSBox and copy its name.

## Notes
- Run the script and choose「Select iCon」to start.

## Author
description.zh:
# iCon Picker

用于选择 JSBox iCon 并复制其名称。

## 说明
- 运行脚本后点击「选择 iCon」开始。

## 作者

description.en:
# JSBox Share Link

A script which is used to generate official share link of xteko.com/redir from within JSBox scripts.

## Notes
- Default configuration will be got from the script's setting.
- For a simple script, all parameters can be configured.
- For a package, parameters other than `Name` and `URL` will not be configured, you should set these parameters from `config.json`.

## Author
description.zh:
# JSBox Share Link

用于从 JSBox 脚本生成 xteko.com/redir 官方分享链接。

## 说明
- 初始参数配置将从原脚本设置获取；
- 对于单文件脚本，所有参数均可配置；
- 对于安装包格式脚本，除了 `名称` 和 `URL` 以外的参数均不可配置，请从 `config.json` 配置这些参数。

## 作者

description.en:
# QR Decoder

A script which is used to decode QR Code from share extension or main app.

## Notes
- Simply share a QR Code image and run as this script.
- Or you can just run from main app to select a QR Code image.

## Author
description.zh:
# QR Decoder

用于通过分享或主应用运行以解码二维码图片。

## 说明
- 直接把二维码图片通过分享以此脚本运行；
- 或从主应用运行并选择相册内的二维码图片。

## 作者
